column4: I am having trouble connecting to WEP with the rtl8187 chipset, I can connect to open wireless access-points, and I can inject packets but I cannot connect to wep
did you tried to install wicd as network manager? wich ubuntu do you run?
may you try wicd. it runs great on my laptop with ubuntu 8.04 lts
no, i dont have any other stuff, cause it works at my laptop
